name: Healthy Warrior
description:
Healthy Warrior A game made in 7 days for the Blackthornprod's Game Jam!!

Shoot & defeat Junk Food Legends like Burger, Pizza, and more... to prevent human beings from eating too much Junk Food. As less Junk Food is more healthiness. 

Tools used for making this game -
  • Unity 2018.4
  • SFXR
  • Audacity
  • GIMP
  • Illustrator
Controls - 
  • WASD or Arrow Keys - Movement
  • Aim & Shoot - Mouse
